summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the Director of Engineering to undertake design activities and to prepare plans, specifications and estimates to repair and restore of vehicular traffic the 1900 block of Perkins Lane West where a landslide has resulted in the closure of the road; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1981 Budget of the Engineering Department; authorizing the hiring of consultants; and making appropriations from the Engineering Operating and Arterial City Street Funds therefor.
